document.full_text: the chicago white sox handed pitcher trevor cahill his first defeat of the season as they held on for a nail-biting 4-3 victory over the oakland athletics on sunday.
document.title: white sox first to beat cahill in 4-3 win
lines_and_colors: the chicago white sox handed pitcher trevor cahill his first defeat of the season as they held on for a nail-biting 4-3 victory over the oakland athletics on sunday.
